name: persian-datepicker-element
description: A modern Jalali (Shamsi) Date Picker web component with shadcn-like styling

1.0.17: Added 'Today' button ('امروز') at the bottom of the calendar for quick navigation to current day
Added 'Tomorrow' (فردا) button for quick navigation to the next day
Positioned Today and Tomorrow buttons at opposite ends for balanced layout
Added month and year dropdown selectors for quick navigation between dates
Implemented 150-year range navigation (100 years back, 50 years forward)
Fixed event tooltips to be fully visible when hovering over calendar days
Improved touch gesture handling to prevent page lag and scrolling interference
Enhanced animation performance with optimized timing and containment
Added support for customization via 'today-button-text', 'today-button-class', 'tomorrow-button-text' and 'tomorrow-button-class' attributes
Improved navigation UX with native select dropdown interaction
Enhanced accessibility for date selection with keyboard navigation support
Added Persian month names in dropdowns for better localization
1.0.14: Major performance improvements for touch interactions
Fixed lag when calculating calendar position
Added hardware acceleration for smoother transitions
Improved touch gesture recognition to prevent unwanted page scrolling
Fixed timing issues in touch event handling
Expanded touch detection area for more reliable gesture recognition
1.0.13: Improved touch gesture handling to prevent unwanted page scrolling during calendar swipes
Added proper touch-action properties to all interactive elements
Fixed mobile swipe interactions to work more reliably
Improved touch event handling for smoother mobile experience

scripts.build: pnpm run build:clean && pnpm run build:prod && pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run build:esm && pnpm run minify && pnpm run cleanup
scripts.build:clean: set CLEAN_DIST=true && set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=placeholder.js && rspack
scripts.build:prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.min.js && set MINIFY=true && rspack
scripts.build:dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.js && set MINIFY=false && rspack
scripts.build:esm: set NODE_ENV=production && set OUTPUT_FILE=persian-datepicker-element.esm.js && set MODULE_TYPE=module && set MINIFY=true && rspack
scripts.minify: node minify.js persian-datepicker-element.min.js && node minify.js persian-datepicker-element.esm.js

author: Ahmad Mehrabi
